Deployment Kubernetes Dashboard :-
kubectl apply -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubernetes/dashboard/v2.7.0/aio/deploy/recommended.yaml
kubectl get pods -n kubernetes-dashboard
kubectl get svc -n kubernetes-dashboard
kubectl edit svc kubernetes-dashboard -n kubernetes-dashboard
  Edit custer service from cluster ip to NodePort
kubectl get svc -n kubernetes-dashboard
  Copy public IP of any node and port no and Hit on browser.
  Example: - https://39.110.26.26:33991/ 

RBAC With Kubeconfig File :-
kubectl create ns cka
kubectl create sa user1 -n cka 
kubectl create role myrole1 --verb=get,list,watch --resource=pods -n cka
kubectl create rolebinding mybind1 --role=myrole1 --serviceaccount=cka:user1 -n cka
kubectl create token user1 -n cka 
kubectl config set-credentials user1 --token=<Paste Token>
kubectl config set-context --current-user=user1
cp .kube/config myconfig
  File Should Looks Like Below If It doesn't Looks Like This Make It Look Like THIS Just Dont Change Clusters Configuration
cat myconfig
